name: INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF THE BODY AND TRAILER BUILDING INDUSTRY
goal:
CLCCR advocates the various interests of trailer manufacturers and body builders. It functions as an international forum, through which its members discuss issues of common interest and develop mutual positions, offers a liasion between its members and the different international und European organizations,
represents approved CLCCR positions to different international and European organizations,
provides information services to its members and interested parties.
euInitiatives:
CO2 regulation for heavy duty vehicles
type-approval legislation
regulation on masses and dimensions for heavy duty vehicles
